channel.title: [562]Need help making pk zones[562]
channel.description:
Hey, so what I want to do with my server is make it pk. My home is grand exchange and I want to make everywhere pk other then there.....(or something like that) First off is there away to make all of the world/map what ever pk. Then if there is, is there a way to make safe zone? (Home) and others
If you can help me in any ways please add coolman867@live.ca (msn) or post below..
